Texts.Eng: DANGER! Your mech's temperature control systems are failing! Evacuate immediately!
Hostile entities also exist in zero-gravity environments. My cosmonautical records indicate that defeating them may result in obtaining an energy battery, which your mech can absorb.
I am recieving some unusual bio-signatures on this ship. Sufficient caution is recommended.
Initial environmental scans indicate that this area is particularly hazardous, even when in a mech. Caution is advised.
Please be aware of your mech's energy reserves, visualised as the ^#60b8ea;blue bar^white; you can see above your vehicle. Your mech's energy will deplete over time or when the vehicle takes damage.
The mech is too large to continue through this area. ^#71f2f6;Press E to enter and exit the mech^white; - I advise that you proceed on foot.
These targets can be destroyed with your mech's primary weapon. My probability matrix has concluded that destroying them may allow you to progress.
This appears to be an old Terrene Protectorate Storage Facility. No such place exists on my records.
This teleporter indicates that ^green;you have completed Dr. Akaggy's advanced test course^white;. You should report back to her.

WARNING: Your vehicle is not certified for this environment!
Disregarding this warning may cause pilot death and/or invalidation of vehicle warranty.
You are now suspended in a zero-gravity environment. The mech you are piloting is designed to travel through space - I would strongly advise that you do not attempt to exit the vehicle for now.
Your mech switches to a ground-movement configuration when in an environment with gravity. I would advise you continue to proceed in your mech.
^green;You appear to have completed Dr. Akaggy's test course^white;. I must declare that I am curious as to how such a large ship came to be abandoned, but my records present no conclusion.
